017package org.forgerock.openig.config.env;
018
019import org.forgerock.openig.config.Environment;
020
021/**
022 * Delegates to a unix or windows type environment depending on the OS.
023 *
024 * @since 2.2
025 */
026public class PlatformEnvironment extends EnvironmentDelegate {
027
028    /**
029     * Delegatee.
030     */
031    private final Environment delegate;
032
033    /**
034     * Builds a new platform specific {@link Environment} depending on the {@literal os.name} system property.
035     */
036    public PlatformEnvironment() {
037        if (System.getProperty("os.name").toLowerCase().contains("win")) {
038            delegate = new WindowsEnvironment();
039        } else {
040            delegate = new UnixEnvironment();
041        }
042
043    }
044
045    @Override
046    protected Environment delegate() {
047        return delegate;
048    }
049}
